Class Ball

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Ball

public class Ball
extends greenfoot.Actor

A ball is an object that can hit other objects and bounce off the edges of the world (except the bottom edge). It will bounce off of a paddle as well.

Version:
1.0 April 6, 2007
Author:
Barbara Ericson Georgia Tech

Method Summary
 void act()
          Balls will move and check if they have hit a brick or paddle or one of the edges of the world

          Method to set the ball color
 void updateImage()
          Method to create the image and set it for the ball If you change the ball width or color you should invoke this again

Constructor that takes initial values for all fields

Parameters:
theRadius - the radius to use
theColor - the color to use
theVelX - the amount to change in X per act
theVelY - the amount to change in Y per act
